items.content_html: A simple, lightweight, and secure WAF. Developed based on Nginx and connected as a reverse proxy. Protect your web applications from common attacks and exploits.

items.content_html: A small lightweight HTTP server that converts photos, images and scanned documents to text using optical character recognition by utilizing the power of Google Tesseract.

items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript-based feature flag manager that enables conditional feature activation based on user-specific rules and percentage rollouts.
items.title: micheal081/features-manager: A lightweight TypeScript-based feature flag manager that enables conditional feature activation based on user-specific rules and percentage rollouts.

items.content_html: good.db is a lightweight Node.js library for simple local database operations with JSON files. Organize, manage, and manipulate data easily.
items.title: good-db/good.db:   good.db is a lightweight Node.js library for simple local database operations with JSON files. Organize, manage, and manipulate data easily.

items.content_html: This repository contains the project I developed to interact with the local Ollama API. Ollama is a lightweight and extensible framework for running open-source language models on your own computer.

items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) or on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, Tinkerboard, IntelNUC, etc.)

items.content_html: A lightweight, highly configurable MQTT proxy built on Pipy for efficient MQTT traffic handling, enabling secure and scalable IoT communication. Optimized for low latency and high throughput, the Pipy MQTT Proxy enhances MQTT protocol routing and load balancing with easy deployment and management.
items.title: flomesh-io/pipy-mqtt-proxy: A lightweight, highly configurable MQTT proxy built on Pipy for efficient MQTT traffic handling, enabling secure and scalable IoT communication. Optimized for low latency and high throughput, the Pipy MQTT Proxy enhances MQTT protocol routing and load balancing with easy deployment and management.
